argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_dvdsadd | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( M || N <-> M || ( M + N ) ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_zcn | |- ( M e. ZZ -> M e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | #P_zcn | |- ( N e. ZZ -> N e. CC ) |
| 4 |  | #P_addcom | |- ( ( M e. CC /\ N e. CC ) -> ( M + N ) = ( N + M ) ) |
| 5 | 2, 3, 4 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( M + N ) = ( N + M ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_breq2d | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( M || ( M + N ) <-> M || ( N + M ) ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 6 | #P_bitrd | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( M || N <-> M || ( N + M ) ) ) |
